metadata.description: This ruleset provides analysis of Java EE applications that need to migrate to Jakarta JSON Binding 3.0.

hint.title: Types annotated with the jakarta.json.bind.annotation.JsonbCreator annotation no longer require all parameters to be present
hint.message: By default, types annotated with the `jakarta.json.bind.annotation.JsonbCreator` annotation no longer require all parameters to be present in the JSON content. Default values will be used if the JSON being parsed is missing one of the parameters. The EE 8 behavior of requiring that all parameters be present in the JSON can be turned on by calling `jakarta.json.bind.JsonbConfig().withCreatorParametersRequired(true)`.
